JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Data Scientist / Software Engineer Wanted for Development of Webshop and Internal Systems at Schmiedmann, Specialist in BMW & MINI
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Schmiedmann Odense A/S is seeking a Data Scientist / Software Engineer to develop our webshop and internal systems.

Your Responsibilities:

  • Development of our website and webshop.
  • Programming of internal systems.
  • IT security and IT support for our internal employees and departments.
  • Maintenance and development of IT/network infrastructure.

 Your Qualifications:

  • Educated as a Data scientist or similar.
  • Professional experience in developing web solutions.
  • Experience with solutions written in ASP.NET / C#.
  • Knowledge of Umbraco CMS is a plus.
  • Database programming (MySQL).
  • Experience with basic server administration.
  • Effective, independent, honest, stable, and loyal.

 We Offer:

  • An exciting job with diverse responsibilities.
  • Possible opportunity for a weekly work-from-home day.
  • A modern and pleasant working environment with great colleagues.
  • Company-paid meal plans on Mondays and Thursdays.
  • Health insurance and pension plan.
  • Company-paid dress code.
  • Working hours Monday to Friday from 08:00 to 16:00.

 Applications with relevant documents will be treated confidentially and should be sent to:
Email: job.odense@schmiedmann.com

We look forward to receiving your application!

A bit about the Company:

Schmiedmann Odense A/S is a 28-year-old company specializing in international sales of BMW & MINI spare parts/equipment for passenger cars and BMW motorcycles. Schmiedmann consists of two Danish and six foreign branches, with the Odense branch serving as the central warehouse and concept development site for the other branches. We have about 30 employees in the Odense branch.

For more information, visit:

·         www.schmiedmann.dk

·         www.linkedin.com/schmiedmann

·         www.facebook.com/schmiedmann

·         www.instagram.com/schmiedmann
